Package capstone.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DisplayDriver
    Creates the window containing the sequencer and runs it.
    Note
    Class representing a note in music.
    NoteButton
    A button that represents a musical note, and allows the note it contains to be modified when clicked.
    Scale
    A class representation of a musical scale.
    SequencerDisplay
    A graphical interface that represents a music sequencer.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TimeSignature
    A class enumerating several musical time signatures.
